name: Graviturgy Magic
description: Graviturgists manipulate the fundamental forces of gravity, altering weight, movement, and destructive force.

2.name: Adjust Density
2.description: You can magically alter the weight of a creature or object, either increasing its mass to hinder movement or reducing it to enhance speed.

6.name: Gravity Well
6.description: When you cast a spell that affects a creature, you can move that creature 5 feet to an unoccupied space if it is willing or fails a saving throw.

10.name: Violent Attraction
10.description: You can intensify gravity around a creature, increasing the damage it takes from a fall or from a ranged attack.

14.name: Event Horizon
14.description: You create a powerful gravitational field that damages and restrains creatures in a large area around you.
